name: Bomb Maze (sheep431)
description:
It's a cute maze vr adventure game.

1. Read the hint on the entry door;

2. Use Bomb to kill monsters, you can not pass the stage once you failed kill any monster cause the number of bumb is limited.

3. You will have key after killing a monster, door must be opened accordding to the sequence.

4. If you can not throw a bomb accratly, please use crate wisely.

5. Have fun.
